title: Lead Developer / Azure DevOps
summary: Led GLP-compliant lab platform across WebForms/MVC/WebAPI, WinForms, and Xamarin with Oracle-backed services, configurable reporting, and Azure DevOps delivery.
description: Led delivery of GLP-compliant lab software with dynamic user-defined data models and custom reporting that preserved traceability and audit trails.
Designed and built ASP.NET WebForms/MVC/WebAPI services with RESTful OData and SOAP endpoints backed by Oracle using nHibernate, Entity Framework, and PL/SQL.
Implemented configurable reporting pipelines so customers could extend data models and generate compliant reports without vendor changes.
Built responsive web interfaces with CSS3, Flexbox, Bootstrap, and AngularJS for desktop and tablet users.
Maintained WinForms clients and Xamarin Forms mobile apps that worked offline and synchronized when connectivity returned.
Guided release engineering and Azure DevOps practices for builds, deployments, and database migrations across environments.
Mentored developers through code reviews and pairing to raise quality on a mixed WebForms/MVC/WebAPI stack.
Worked directly with customers and QA on GLP expectations, ensuring versioning, audit logging, and data lineage were respected in every feature.
